g.aria-label: X-axis for a discrete scale with 6 values: Personal consumption expenditures, Imports, Private inventory investment, Government spending, Exports, Private fixed investment
Y-axis titled 'percentage' for a linear scale with values from −15 to 9
Title text 'American Samoa: Contributions to the Percent Change in Real GDP'
g.text: American Samoa: Contributions to the Percent Change in Real GDP
